name: Baopingwan Coal Mine

The Baopingwan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Jungar Banner of Ordos City, Inner Mongolia

operators: 准格尔旗弓家塔宝平湾煤炭有限责任公司 (Jungar Banner Gongjiata Baopingwan Coal Company)
owners: 北京华源佳鑫投资有限公司 (Beijing Huayuan Jiaxin Investment Company)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Jungar Banner Gongjiata Baopingwan Coal Company, which is fully owned by Beijing Huayuan Jiaxin Investment Company.
